title: A Witches Tale, Stuff and things and what boredom brings
description: Welcome to Ravenswood. Home to Alexi Carvelle, her best friend 'Logan Stewart' and all of the magical creatures soon to be discovered. Alexi is dealing with a huge loss in her life, that of her Mother and as she is coping with this suddenly her calm world in ravenswood is disrupted by the appearance of a mysterious boy by the name of Kyle Huntington, who is about to change Alexi's world forever. "Stuff & Things and what boredom brings, a witches tale" is book one in this playful adventure full of romance, magic, humor and coming of age. A modern day classic sure to delight.
author: Rue Volley
